description.narrative: The package comprises a $654-million emergency loan (the Flood Emergency Reconstruction Project [FERP]) to help meet urgent reconstruction priorities, focused on transport (primarily roads and bridges) and irrigation. The proposed assistance package has been designed according to the priorities of the damage and needs assessment (DNA) prepared by ADB and the World Bank, in collaboration with the federal and provincial governments and other development partners.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Critical physical infrastructure to restore livelihoods and access to markets has been put in place. Assets are rebuilt back to their original standards or better.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Pre-flood employment level of women (1.7 million) in agriculture for Sindh restored by Sep 2014

description.narrative: Critical physical infrastructure to restore livelihoods and access to markets has been put in place. Assets are rebuilt back to their original standards or better.

title.narrative: 90% of the damages identified for national roads in the DNA Report are addressed by Sep 2014

description.narrative: Critical physical infrastructure to restore livelihoods and access to markets has been put in place. Assets are rebuilt back to their original standards or better.

title.narrative: 81 major flood embankments (estimated length of 1,000 km) restored.

description.narrative: Critical physical infrastructure to restore livelihoods and access to markets has been put in place. Assets are rebuilt back to their original standards or better.

title.narrative: Pre-flood employment level of men (4.3 million) in agriculture for Sindh restored by Sep 2014

description.narrative: Critical physical infrastructure to restore livelihoods and access to markets has been put in place. Assets are rebuilt back to their original standards or better.

title.narrative: Pre-flood irrigation systems with a water carrying capacity of 40 million cubic meters restored in Sindh by Sep 2014

description.narrative: Critical physical infrastructure to restore livelihoods and access to markets has been put in place. Assets are rebuilt back to their original standards or better.

title.narrative: 800 km of provincial roads restored, rehabilitated by Sep 2014.

description.narrative: Critical physical infrastructure to restore livelihoods and access to markets has been put in place. Assets are rebuilt back to their original standards or better.

title.narrative: Improved capacity of IAs and EAs in terms of fiduciary management, procurement, safeguard compliance and gender mainstreaming - progress measured through reconstruction projects (by Sep 2014)

description.narrative: Critical physical infrastructure to restore livelihoods and access to markets has been put in place. Assets are rebuilt back to their original standards or better.
